Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: PART II EXPLANATION: COLUMNS (A)-(B)(2013-2014 YEARS) REPORT THE TWO (2) FISCAL YEARS ENDING DECEMBER 31, 2015. COLUMN (C)(2015 YEAR) REFLECTS THE YEAR THE CHANGE OF ACCOUNTING PERIOD TOOK PLACE AND REPORTS THE SHORT YEAR OF JANUARY 1, 2016 THRU SEPTEMBER 30, 2016. COLUMN (D)-(E) (2016-2017 YEARS) REPORTS THE TWO (2) FISCAL YEARS ENDING SEPTEMBER 30,2018.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DONOR'S INTENTION FOR THE ORIGINAL ENDOWMENT FUNDS RECEIVED WAS TO PRESERVE THE CORPUS OR INITIAL AMOUNT OF THE GIFT TO PROVIDE LONG TERM BENEFIT TO THE AGENCY, ALLOWING THE AGENCY THE NEAR-TERM BENEFIT OF THE EARNINGS AND MARKET APPRECIATION OF THOSE ASSETS FOR THE AGENCY'S WELL- BEING.

FAMILY SUPPORT - SERVICES RELATED TO INFANT/TODDLER CONCERNS: HEALTHY DEVELOPMENT AND HOME-BASED PARENT SUPPORT AND EMPLOYEE ASSISTANCE

REVIEW OF THE 990 WILL BE UNDERTAKEN BY CERTAIN MEMBERS OF THE FINANCE COMMITTEE PRIOR TO RELEASE TO THE IRS. A COPY OF THE 990 WILL BE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BOARD PRIOR TO SUBMISSION. THE AUDIT COMMITTEE ALSO REVIEWS THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SINGLE AUDIT AND REPORTS DIRECTLY TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AS A WHOLE.
ANNUAL STATEMENTS ARE SIGNED BY ALL BOARD MEMBERS ASKING FOR ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST WHICH CURRENTLY EXIST.

THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE PERFORMANCE OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO ANNUALLY. THE PERFORMANCE IS MEASURED AGAINST METRICS THAT MEASURE KEY PERFORMANCE AREAS RELATIVE TO THE DUTIES OF THE POSITION. TO DETERMINE THE COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO, THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE COMPENSATION OF OTHER LEADING NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS IN THE REGION BY REVIEWING THEIR MOST RECENT FORM 990'S. FACTORS THAT DETERMINE THE COMPENSATION INCLUDE THE RANGE OF SALARIES IN SIMILIAR ORGANIZATIONS, THE COMPLEXITY OF THE ORGANIZATIONS, RELATIVE SIZE AND THE PERFORMANCE IN THE ROLE OVER THE PRECEDING 12 MONTHS.
ANNUAL EMPLOYEE REVIEW PROCESS WHEREBY INCREASES ARE AWARDED BASED ON MERIT.
THE ANNUAL REPORT IS DISTRIBUTED TO DONORS EVERY YEAR AND AVAILABLE ON OUR WEBSITE. THE 990 CAN BE REVIEWED ON THE GOVERNMENT WEBSITE, GUIDESTAR WEBSITE, AND UPON REQUEST.
